name: CalmMyPet
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: calm my pet
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Calm My Pet lets you reproduce audio tracks that will calm your pet. Your pet will tank you for the relax this skill will give him.

To add this skill on your Alexa Routines, please do the following:

Enable this Alexa skill. 
On Alexa app, navigate to Routines. 
Click + to add a new routine. 
Click + for "When this happens" and choose one. 
Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills". 
Choose "Your Skills". 
Select this skill. 
Click Next. 
Choose Device to perform the routine to. 
Click Save. 

Stay updated on Smart Skills also on Instagram! 
Smart Skills - (@smartskills.it)
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
